personalInfo.positionTitle: Software Developer at Corpus Enterprises Private Limited
personalInfo.about: Hi, I'm Maroti. I am a Full Stack Developer with {experience} of professional experience. I specialize in building modern web applications using Java, Spring Boot, Angular, and React.
personalInfo.summary: Full Stack Developer who knows Java and the Spring framework. I'm looking for a job where I can use my skills to help the company grow. I have experience creating web applications that are easy to use and maintain. I focus on writing clean code and delivering good results. I'm eager to keep learning and growing with the team.
personalInfo.personalBackground: I hail from Maharashtra, India, where I completed my graduation from Mumbai University in 2021. Coming from a close-knit family of six siblings - four elder sisters and a younger brother - I learned the values of responsibility and perseverance early in life. Since 2010, following the passing of my father, I've embraced the role of a responsible family member, balancing my professional growth with family responsibilities. This experience has shaped me into a more dedicated and resilient professional, bringing these same values of commitment and responsibility to my work.
history: Started my professional journey in 2022 at Corpus Enterprises Private Limited as a Full Stack Developer.
Gained extensive experience in Java Spring Boot and Hibernate for backend development, creating robust and efficient server-side applications.
Developed expertise in Angular and Bootstrap for frontend development, focusing on creating responsive and user-friendly interfaces.
Worked on various enterprise-level applications, contributing to both backend and frontend development while following best practices and design patterns.

personalInfo.positionTitle: Software Developer at Wellness 360 Technologies Inc
personalInfo.tagline: React Native | Nextjs | React | TypeScript | Redux | JavaScript | HTML5 & CSS3 | Java | DSA
personalInfo.about: I am a passionate Software Developer with expertise in building modern web applications and mobile solutions. My journey in software development has been driven by a deep interest in creating efficient, user-friendly, and scalable applications.
personalInfo.summary: I specialize in developing responsive web applications using Next.js, React.js, and mobile applications using React Native. My work involves creating intuitive user interfaces, implementing complex functionalities, and ensuring optimal performance across different devices and platforms. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices. My approach involves understanding project requirements thoroughly, planning effectively, and implementing solutions that are both efficient and scalable. I'm passionate about staying updated with the latest technologies and continuously improving my skills.
personalInfo.personalBackground: I am from Maharashtra, India, where I completed my education from Savitribai Phule Pune University. I have a strong foundation in computer science and a passion for building modern web applications. My journey in software development began with learning the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, which eventually led me to explore more advanced technologies like React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
history: Started my professional journey in 2023 at Wellness 360 Technologies Inc as a Software Developer.
Developed expertise in React Native for mobile app development, creating cross-platform applications for both Android and iOS.
Gained extensive experience in Next.js and TypeScript for building modern web applications with improved performance and type safety.
Worked on integrating third-party APIs such as Google Fit, Samsung Health, and Fitbit to enhance the functionality of health tracking applications.

technicalExpertise.Frontend: React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS
technicalExpertise.Programming: JavaScript, TypeScript, Data Structures and Algorithms

currentFocus: Developing responsive web applications using Next.js and React.js
Building cross-platform mobile applications with React Native
Creating intuitive user interfaces with modern design principles
Staying updated with the latest technologies and best practices
dreams: Mastering advanced concepts in React Native and Next.js
Contributing to innovative health and wellness solutions
Expanding knowledge in mobile app development and cross-platform solutions
Growing as a technical leader in the health tech industry
Building impactful applications that make a difference
funFacts: I have developed multiple mobile applications from concept to deployment
I enjoy solving complex UI/UX challenges in mobile applications
I've contributed to open-source projects in the React ecosystem
I can code while listening to music, which helps me focus better
I'm passionate about health and wellness technologies

experiences.technologies: Next.js, React, TypeScript, React Native, HTML5, CSS3, Material UI

projects.title: CountryInfo Mobile App
projects.description: A comprehensive mobile application that provides detailed information about countries worldwide. Users can search for countries, view detailed information including population, capital, languages, currencies, and more. The app features a clean, intuitive interface with smooth navigation and responsive design.
projects.technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, REST API, Vercel

projects.title: Wellness360 App
projects.description: A comprehensive health and wellness application that aggregates data from various health apps and devices. The app provides personalized health challenges, habit tracking, and a detailed health journey visualization. Users can monitor their progress, set goals, and receive insights to improve their overall well-being through an intuitive and engaging interface.
projects.technologies: React Native, JavaScript, TypeScript, Redux, REST API, Firebase

site.title: About My Portfolio
site.introduction: Welcome to my digital space! This portfolio is crafted with modern web technologies to showcase my professional journey and technical expertise in an elegant and interactive way.

technicalStack.title: Technology Stack
technicalStack.description: This portfolio harnesses the power of modern web technologies:

technologies.name: React 19
technologies.description: Powering the interactive UI components with the latest React features and hooks

technologies.name: React Router
technologies.description: Enabling dynamic routing with smooth page transitions and nested routes

developmentApproach.title: Development Strategy
developmentApproach.description: Built with a focus on user experience and code quality:
practices: Modular React components for maximum reusability
Responsive layouts that adapt seamlessly to any device
Dynamic routing for a smooth, app-like experience
Optimized bundle size for faster page loads
Semantic HTML and ARIA labels for accessibility

deployment.title: Deployment Strategy
deployment.description: Optimized for performance through static site generation, utilizing React Scripts for production builds. The result is a fast, reliable, and easily maintainable web application.

footer.text: Explore my work and let's discuss how we can collaborate on your next project.
